name: Alien Science
description:
As an apprentice researcher living on the edge studying extraterrestrial biology, each day brings an exciting new adventure.

An unexpected discovery leads to momentous changes in your daily life. How will you survive?

Created for Adventure Jam 2020, this is a short text-parser driven adventure game. Hope you have a sense of humor. 

Design, art, code: Phil Fortier
Music: Logan Fieth
(additional art Steve Allen)

-----------------------------------
If you've never played a Sierra-style text-parser adventure game before, here are the controls:

  • Type to start entering commands!
  • Arrow keys or click to move
  • ESC for the menu
  • TAB or 'stuff' to show your inventory
  • SPACE or 'switch' to switch characters (if available)
  • Hold SHIFT to move more quickly

Examples of things you can type:

  • 'open door'
  • 'look house'
  • 'look in well'
  • 'mail postcard'
  • 'attach rope to car'
  • 'turn on lights'
  • 'put kettle on stove'
